title: Mike Tyson coming to Marksville: After life of turmoil and regrets, finally learning to 'enjoy it properly'
text: Oct 16, 2015 11:31 Mike Tyson coming to Marksville: After life of turmoil and regrets, finally learning to 'enjoy it properly' Mike Tyson coming to Marksville: After life of turmoil and regrets, finally learning to 'enjoy it properly' Photo provided by Paragon Casino -- Mike Tyson's one-man-show 'Undisputed Truth' starts at 8 p.m. at Paragon Casino's Mari Showroom in Marksville.
